p: Feature types combination (FC) and regularization multiplier (RM) are two important parameters that affect model complexity (Merow et al., 2013; Muscarella et al., 2015). ENMeval, an R package, was proved to be useful for tuning these two parameters (RM and FC) (Muscarella et al., 2015). Thus, corrected Akaike information criteria (AICc) value was used to estimate the model complexity in MaxEnt (Dan & Seifert, 2011).The smallest AICc was chosen for model simulation and was thought to can reduce model complexity relative to the default model.
